headlines.description: Bologna forward Riccardo Orsolini rifled in a free kick from the unlikeliest of angles deep into stoppage time to give his side a 1-1 draw to Fioren
headlines.shortLinkText: Bologna earn stoppage time draw vs. Fiorentina

headlines.description: Zlatan Ibrahimovic's second half introduction failed to inspire AC Milan to victory as they laboured to a 0-0 draw at home against Sampdoria.
headlines.shortLinkText: Milan labour to bore draw on Ibrahimovic debut

headlines.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scored a hat trick as Juventus started 2020 with a 4-0 win against Cagliari.
headlines.shortLinkText: New year, same Ronaldo: Hat trick powers romp

venue.fullName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

venue.displayName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

headlines.description: Inter Milan forward Romelu Lukaku scored twice, the first from a run which started inside his own half, to lead his side to a 3-1 win at Napoli.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lukaku double gives Inter impressive win at Napoli
